en.banner_brief: Safe, stable, and development of enterprise-class cloud platform
en.banner_describe: UOS 4.0 is based on open source Ceph as the underlying storage, OpenStack IaaS as the core, the integration of open source data, open source cloud platform experience.
en.design_detail_four: Set monitoring, log, alarm in an integrated o&m platform to understand the health of the system for the stable operation.
en.design_detail_four_two: From the system layer to layer, from hardware to software, covering computing, storage monitoring services.
en.design_detail_one: Thoroughly solve the difficult problem of OpenStack deployment, Quickly delivers a ready Ready OpenStack cloud platform for you.
en.design_detail_one_two: UOS Director leverages OpenStack's existing services to complete the OpenStack deployment.
en.design_detail_three: User-friendly OpenStack operation and maintenance management user interface more quickly.
en.design_detail_three_two: Openstack in-depth insight into the customer tailored to their own user interface.
en.design_detail_two: Safe, open, tested UOS 4.0, paved the way for your business data center cloud.
en.design_detail_two_two: The UOS OpenStack release runs the OpenStack mission to build a secure, open, and high-performance cloud platform for businesses.
en.main_introduction: Is a UOS product installation and deployment tool, based on the OpenStack community TripleO project development, integration of the OpenStack project, Ceph, UOS research projects and monitoring, log, alarm and other operational tools, automated deployment, it will be complex UOS system deployment Delivery, simplification, and high degree of certainty and controllability.
en.product_brief: Safe, open, tested UOS 4.0 paves the way for your business data center cloud, help your customers maintain and maintain their privacy Cloud platform
en.speciality_five_brief: New deployment tools, fast delivery cloud platform.
en.speciality_four_brief: Large data platform, PaaS platform, container platform, a full set of solutions.
en.speciality_one_brief: Virtual machine, bare metal, container full tube.
en.speciality_six_brief: To provide customers with human cloud platform operation and maintenance management user interface, providing a large number of functions, simplify the operation of the user more difficult.
en.speciality_three_brief: From the system layer, to the application layer, from hardware to software, covering computing, network, storage and other core services monitoring services.
en.speciality_two_brief: From physical devices, to service components, from virtual machines to routers, all highly available
en.title: UnitedStack - UOS Director

zh.banner_brief: 安全、稳定、开放的企业级云平台
zh.banner_describe: UOS 4.0 是以开源 Ceph为底层存储，OpenStack IaaS为核心，整合开源大数据、PaaS平台以及容器平台的全栈开源云操作系统，为企业提供完整功能的一体化开源云平台体验。
zh.design_detail_four: 集监控，日志，告警于一体的综合性运维平台，了解系统的健康状况，为平台的稳定运行保驾护航。
zh.design_detail_four_two: 提供从系统层到应用层，从硬件到软件，涵盖计算，网络，存储的监控服务。
zh.design_detail_one: 解决 OpenStack 部署难、升级难问题，为您快速交付一个 Production Ready 的 OpenStack 云平台。
zh.design_detail_one_two: UOS Director 充分利用OpenStack 现有服务完成 OpenStack 部署。
zh.design_detail_three: 人性化 OpenStack 运维管理用户界面，快速掌握 OpenStack 使用。提供良好架构，方便二次开发。
zh.design_detail_three_two: 对openstack深入的洞悉，为客户量身定制属于自己的可扩展的用户界面。
zh.design_detail_two: 安全、开放、历经考验的 UOS 4.0，为您的企业数据中心云化铺平了第一道路。同时提供能力扩展与增值。
zh.design_detail_two_two: UOS OpenStack发行版践行 OpenStack 使命，为企业构建安全、开放、高性能云平台。
zh.main_introduction: 是UOS产品的安装部署工具，基于OpenStack社区的TripleO项目进行开发，集成了OpenStack项目，Ceph，UOS自研项目以及监控，日志，告警等运维工具的自动化部署，它将复杂的UOS系统的部署交付，变得简单化，同时具有高度的确定性和可控性。
zh.product_brief: 安全、开放、历经考验的 UOS 4.0，为您的企业数据中心云化铺平了第一道路，帮助并协助客户运维和持续改进私有云云平台。
zh.speciality_five_brief: 全新部署工具，快速交付云平台。
zh.speciality_four_brief: 大数据平台，PaaS 平台，容器平台全套解决方案。
zh.speciality_one_brief: 虚拟机，裸机，容器全纳管。
zh.speciality_six_brief: 为客户提供人性化的云平台运维管理用户界面，提供大量功能，简化用户操作难度。
zh.speciality_three_brief: 从系统层，到应用层，从硬件到软件，涵盖计算，网络，存储等核心服务的监控服务。
zh.speciality_two_brief: 从物理设备，到服务组件，从虚拟机，到路由器，全部实现高可用。
zh.title: UnitedStack - UOS Director
